types.section:
{{fr-noun|f}}

# Any plant of the former genus {{taxlink|Sansevieria|genus}}, now included in genus ''[[Dracaena]]'', with common names [[mother-in-law's tongue]], [[devil's tongue]], {{vern|Jinn's tongue}}, {{vern|bow string hemp}}, [[snake plant]], and {{vern|snake tongue}}
types.html:
sansevière f (plural sansevières)

  1. Any plant of the former genus Sansevieria, now included in genus Dracaena, with common names mother-in-law's tongue, devil's tongue, Jinn's tongue, bow string hemp, snake plant, and snake tongue
trans: Any plant of the former genus Sansevieria, now included in genus Dracaena, with common names mother-in-law's tongue, devil's tongue, Jinn's tongue, bow string hemp, snake plant, and snake tongue
